modName: Yet Another Dark Brotherhood Initiate Mod
summary: Replaces the Dark brotherhood Initiates and enhances their combat skills.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=red][b]Yet Another Dark Brotherhood Initiate Mod[/b][/color][/heading]

There are quite a few of these replacers, no? Quite basically, this replaces the bland Nord assassin initiates with two of my own personal characters, a male Bosmer named Conor and a female Argonian named Climbs-Many-Trees. For the sake of simplicity, the voices remain the same.

Conor is classed as a ranger rather then assassin and will use bows in combat over his dagger, while Climbs-Many-Trees is still classed as an assassin and will use either weapon. They are also called 'Initiate NAME', rather then the simple 'Dark Brotherhood Initiate'.

They have some fitting perks to enhance their combat (Overdraw and Bladesman) and some that increase their stealth (Light Foot and Muffled Movement). They both carry a random soul gem, a random poison, Ebony Bow with 50 arrows, Ebony Dagger and a Brotherhood Sword (unique katana that absorbs health).

Please note that with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9752/? ] Masters of Death replacer mod[/url], Conor's hood does not show but it is there with the vanilla armor. I do not know why this is happening and I don't know if it's my mod or the armor's, but it's just something to be aware of.

(If you wish to see other races or your own characters, please contact me).

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Installation[/b]=====[/color]

Download and drop the file into your data folder. Place meshes and/or textures into the appropriately named folders.
Or just use the NMM.
To uninstall, just remove the file.

[color=darkorange]====[b]Compatibility[/b]====[/color]

[i]Compatible:[/i]
Anything and everything (except those listed below, of course).

[i]Incompatible:[/i]
Any mod that replaces the Dark Brotherhood initiates. Conor is also included in my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49075/? ] Forest Shack Mod [/url], but the two will not conflict.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]
This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: Tae-Rai
